column5: I didn’t prepare a diary for today.  My apologies.  I could give you all sorts of reasons — visitors over the weekend house renovations this past week which concluded yesterday afternoon a trip to the ER today etc etc but really I did have a time to do it.  I just didn’t get around to it.   Please put whatever is in your thoughts in the comments below.   Again my apologies.  I do welcome guest authors hint hint...
